title: 92/186/EEC: Council Decision of 19 December 1991 on the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an Agreed Minute amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and Romania on trade in textile products
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 19 December 1991 on the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an Agreed Minute amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and Romania on trade in textile products (92/186/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement in the form of an Agreed Minute amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and Romania on trade in textile products shall be approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreed Minute is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the persons empowered to sign the Agreement in the form of an Agreed Minute referred to in Article 1 in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1991.
For the Council
The President
P. DANKERT
(1) OJ No L 318, 7. 11. 1987, p. 1.(2) See page 1 of this Official Journal.
